title: 115_hr1271
content: DXM Abuse Prevention Act of 2017 This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to: (1)nbsp, require a retailer that sellsnbsp. Certain drugs containing dextromethorphan (DXM) to have a verification system that isnbsp. Intended to ensure that no one under 18 years of age purchases such drugs from the retailer, (2)nbsp, establish other restrictions onnbsp, the sale of over-the-counter drugs containing DXM, and (3)nbsp, establish restrictions on the distribution of bulk DXM.
